001package org.consensusj.bitcoin.rx.jsonrpc;
002
003import io.reactivex.rxjava3.core.Flowable;
004import org.bitcoinj.base.BitcoinNetwork;
005import org.bitcoinj.base.Network;
006import org.consensusj.bitcoin.json.pojo.ChainTip;
007import org.consensusj.bitcoin.json.pojo.TxOutSetInfo;
008import org.consensusj.bitcoin.rx.jsonrpc.service.TxOutSetService;
009
010import java.net.URI;
011import java.time.Duration;
012
013import static java.lang.System.out;
014
015/**
016 * Sample command-line tool that subscribes to ChainTip and TxOutSetInfo
017 */
018public class TxOutSetWatcherSample {
019    public static void main(String[] args) throws InterruptedException {
020        Network network = BitcoinNetwork.MAINNET;
021        String rpcUser = "bitcoinrpc";
022        String rpcPassword = "pass";
023        URI rpcUri = URI.create("http://localhost:8332");
024        boolean useZmq = true;
025
026        try (   RxBitcoinClient client = new RxBitcoinClient(network, rpcUri, rpcUser, rpcPassword, useZmq);
027                TxOutSetService txOutSetService = new TxOutSetService(client, client.chainTipPublisher()) ) {
028
029            client.connectToServer(Duration.ofMinutes(5)).join();
030            // Subscribe to ChainTips
031            Flowable.fromPublisher(client.chainTipPublisher())
032                    .subscribe(TxOutSetWatcherSample::onChainTip, TxOutSetWatcherSample::onError);
033
034            // Blocking subscribe to TxOutSetInfo
035            Flowable.fromPublisher(txOutSetService.getTxOutSetPublisher())
036                    .blockingSubscribe(TxOutSetWatcherSample::onTxOutSetInfo, TxOutSetWatcherSample::onError);
037
038        }
039    }
040
041    static void onChainTip(ChainTip tip) {
042        out.printf("Chain tip: %s/%s\n", tip.getHeight(), tip.getHash());
043    }
044
045    static void onTxOutSetInfo(TxOutSetInfo info) {
046        out.printf("TxOutSetInfo: %s/%s, utxos: %s, total BTC: %s\n",
047                info.getHeight(),
048                info.getBestBlock(),
049                info.getTxOuts(),
050                info.getTotalAmount().toFriendlyString());
051    }
052
053    static void onError(Throwable t) {
054        out.println("Error: " + t);
055    }
056}
